definition: classics/sacred book/scripture/to pass through/to undergo/to bear/to endure/warp (textile)/longitude/menstruation/channel (TCM)/abbr. for economics 經濟|经济[jing1 ji4]
only used in 濟濟|济济[ji3 ji3]
to cross a river/to aid or relieve/to be of help
used in place names associated with the Ji River 濟水|济水[Ji3 Shui3]/surname Ji
Ministry of Foreign Trade and Economic Cooperation (MOFTEC)
pinyin: Dui4 wai4 Mao4 yi4 Jing1 ji4 He2 zuo4 bu4
Guo2 jia1 Jing1 ji4 Mao4 yi4 Wei3 yuan2 hui4

sentences.english: The national leaders have approved the strategy of "promote economy cooperation around Beibu Gulf".
sentences.chinese: 廣西北部灣經濟區在泛北經濟合作中具有戰略地位。

sentences.english: The national leaders have approved the strategy of "promote economy cooperation around Beibu Gulf".
sentences.chinese: 廣西北部灣經濟區在泛北經濟合作中具有戰略地位。

sentences.english: The paper compares the economical efficiency of the VRV heat pump air condition system to the traditional heating systems.
sentences.chinese: 對VRV熱泵空調系統採暖的經濟性進行了分析比較。

sentences.english: Changshan archipelago is rich in resources, and the development of coastal economy is very fast.
sentences.chinese: 長山羣島資源豐富，海島經濟發展較快。

sentences.english: The report cited several societal and economic reasons for the jump.
sentences.chinese: 該報告引用了一些社會和經濟原因解釋這一跨越。

sentences.english: State-owned enterprises are the pillar of the national economy.
sentences.chinese: 國有企業是我國國民經濟的支柱。

sentences.english: Economic construction is an overriding task of China.
sentences.chinese: 經濟建設是中國壓倒一切的中心任務。

sentences.english: Roundtrip Economy class air ticket between Hong Kong and Sanya on Dragonair.
sentences.chinese: 港龍航空公司來回香港至三亞經濟客位機票乙張。

sentences.english: The insurance industry is one of the fastest developing industries in the global economy.
sentences.chinese: 保險行業是全球經濟中發展最快的行業之一。

sentences.english: In opening wider to the outside world, we must pay great attention to safeguarding our national economic security.
sentences.chinese: 在擴大對外開放中，要十分注意維護國家經濟安全。

sentences.english: However the market economy system has brought about a strong dash to the heating supply of the cogeneration.
sentences.chinese: 市場經濟體制帶給熱電聯產向採暖供熱以猛烈衝擊。

sentences.english: Location theory is one of basic parts of economic geography.
sentences.chinese: 區位理論是現代經濟地理學基本理論的重要組成部分。

sentences.english: But the elements of that economic model are universal in character.
sentences.chinese: 但是這種經濟模式的組成要素是放諸四海而皆準的。

sentences.english: The company is located in Xinzhou City Economic and Technological Development Zone.
sentences.chinese: 公司座落在忻州市經濟技術開發區內。

sentences.english: Ttip the punctuated equilibrium of market economics in their favor.
sentences.chinese: 以自己的方式確定市場經濟的準確平衡。

sentences.english: The Construction of Chongqing-Huaihua Railway will exert a tremendous influence on the economic development of the area along the railway.
sentences.chinese: 渝懷鐵路修建對沿線地區經濟發展具有重要意義。

definition: to push (for acceptance of a plan)/to push forward/to promote/to actuate/CL:個|个[ge4]
